page.title: 20VEGETABLE PRICES July 1985
page.content: Lots of the children in the area go strawberry picking in July. We are paid 8p per punnet (about 1lb). You can pick your own for 20p. The farmer sells them for 30p a punnet. Most children can earn on average Â£2 in an evening (4.00 till 7.00). For adults, potato picking earns Â£2 an hour. Potatoes sell for 7p a pound at the farm gate. Most people (especially mums) will do a job such as potato picking or hoeing beet in addition to their other jobs. {crop farm gate supermarket ************************************** {cabbages } 15p 25p lb {peas} 12p 24p lb {carrots } 8p 18p lb {caulis} 18p 44p lb {lettuce } 10p 25p each {strawberries }30p 50p lb **************************************
